item.title: And again
item.author: Giovanni Santini
item.description:
And again

heat and cold
light and dark
life and death

but I still cannot find it
is it all a lie?

and again

06-09-2025

Travel: Poetry, Index

item.title: Immense Power
item.author: Giovanni Santini
item.description:
Such immense power

to do good
to make people happy
to hurt
to start a war
it must be used properly

yet why do I struggle
to rearrange the alphabet
  • 06-09-2025

Travel: Poetry, Index
